description:
Dasonu Maso is back, spreading afros in his wake!  But wait, it gets worse: he now has the ability to change people`s personalities, too, and he`s taking over the entire world.  Can the Keroro Platoon stop him before he completely beats them to their objective?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ダソヌ☆マソ ペコポンはもらった! ブッチャ毛ほしくもないけどね であります
